memo.title: Christmas dinner deposit now due
memo.author: Amy Reid
memo.body: Christmas deposits are now due for Lavs, the dinner & dessert cost £38 each. £25 each will be given to you on the night from the company credit card so don't panic!

memo.title: Attaching cover sheets to TPS reports
memo.author: John Doe
memo.body: This is to remind the division that, starting today, we are now filing all Testing Procedure Specification (TPS) reports with new cover sheets. The reason for this change is simple. In addition to a new format, the cover sheets provide a summary of the report as well as the updated legal copy. The new cover sheets also include Initech's new logo.

memo.title: Changes to the work rota next week
memo.author: Amy Reid
memo.body: For anyone working on the Thursday, we are now opening at 10:30 instead of 10. Friday will resume normal times.
